mapper.select: SELECT g.id AS id, g.user_id AS userId, g.org_name AS orgName, g.prov_code AS provCode, g.city_code AS cityCode, g.area_code AS areaCode, g.prov_desc AS provDesc, g.city_desc AS cityDesc, g.area_desc AS areaDesc, g.address AS address, g.is_manage_org AS isManageOrg FROM ct_group g LEFT JOIN ct_person_group pg ON pg.group_id = g.id AND pg.ext1 = 5 LEFT JOIN ct_user u ON u.id = pg.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} limit 1
select GROUP_CONCAT(ul.user_id) as subUserIds from ct_user_level ul where ul.up_user_id = #{userId}
select GROUP_CONCAT(u.id) as subUserIds from ct_user u where u.pid = #{userId}
select GROUP_CONCAT(pg.user_id) as subUserIds from ct_person_group pg, ct_group g where g.id = pg.group_id and pg.stat = '1' and pg.service_id = '1' and pg.ext1 = '2' and g.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql: SELECT o1.state as state ,count(1) as sumCount FROM (SELECT o.*,(CASE WHEN(o.deal_stat = '04' AND o.subject_id = '0' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 11) THEN '20' WHEN(o.deal_stat = '04' AND o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 23) THEN '20' ELSE o.deal_stat END )state FROM fm_order o

AND o.service_id = 1 AND o.import_type = '0' AND o.is_simple = '0' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM fm_task_info t WHERE t.report_no = o.case_no AND t.source = '1')
AND ( o.car_no like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.case_no like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.work_address like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.seller_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') )

sql.if: AND ( o.seller_user_name like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.case_no like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.order_no like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') OR o.send_address like CONCAT('%',#{otherLike},'%') )

mapper.select:
select o.deal_stat as state, count(1) as sumCount FROM hy_order o
AND o.seller_user_id IN
#{uId}
GROUP BY o.deal_stat
mapper.sql: SELECT o.id AS id, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.subject_id AS subjectId, o.subject_name AS subjectName, o.service_id AS serviceId, o.case_no AS caseNo, o.order_type AS orderType, o.deal_stat AS dealStat, o.send_time AS sendTime, o.buyer_user_id AS buyerUserId, o.buyer_user_name AS buyerUserName, o.seller_user_id AS sellerUserId, o.seller_user_name AS sellerUserName, o.alow_money AS alowMoney, o.car_no AS carNo, o.link_man AS linkMan, o.link_tel AS linkTel, o.is_simple AS isSimple, o.work_address AS workAddress, u.mobile AS sellerUserType FROM fm_order o LEFT JOIN ct_user u on o.seller_user_id = u.id
mapper.select:
AND o.import_type = '0' AND o.service_id = 1
AND ((o.subject_id = '0' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 11) OR (o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 23)) AND o.deal_stat = '04'
AND ((o.subject_id = '0' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) <= 11) OR (o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) <= 23)) AND o.deal_stat = '04'
AND o.deal_stat = #{dealStat}
AND o.is_remote = '0'
AND o.is_remote = '1'
AND o.is_remote = '1'
AND o.is_remote = '9'
AND (o.buyer_user_id IN
#{uId}
OR o.send_id IN
#{uId}
)
ORDER BY o.send_time DESC

AND o.import_type = '0' AND o.service_id = 1
AND ((o.subject_id = '0' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 11) OR (o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) > 23)) AND o.deal_stat = '04'
AND ((o.subject_id = '0' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) <= 11) OR (o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, now()) <= 23)) AND o.deal_stat = '04'
AND o.deal_stat = #{dealStat}
AND o.is_remote = '0'
AND o.is_remote = '1'
AND o.is_remote = '1'
AND o.is_remote = '9'
AND o.seller_user_id IN
#{uId}
ORDER BY o.send_time DESC
mapper.sql: SELECT o.id AS id, o.order_no AS orderNo, o.deal_stat AS dealStat, o.buyer_user_name AS buyerUserName, t.case_linkman AS caseLinkman, t.case_linktel AS caseLinktel, o.seller_user_id AS sellerUserId, o.seller_user_name AS sellerUserName, o.seller_tel AS sellerTel, t.transport_type AS transportType, o.send_time AS sendTime, o.send_address AS sendAddress, t.cargo_name AS cargoName FROM hy_order o LEFT JOIN hy_order_task t ON o.task_id = t.id
mapper.select:
AND o.service_id = 5
AND o.deal_stat = #{dealStat}
AND ( o.buyer_user_id IN ( SELECT t.grant_id_c FROM ct_third_apply_info t WHERE t.`status` = '2' AND t.service_id = 1 AND t.grant_type = '1' AND (t.apply_id_a = #{userId} OR t.middle_id_b = #{userId}) ) OR o.send_user_id = #{userId} )
ORDER BY o.send_time DESC

SELECT id as id, deal_stat as dealStat, order_no as orderNo, case_no as caseNo, car_no as carNo, buyer_user_id as buyerUserId, buyer_user_name as buyerUserName, seller_user_id as sellerUserId, service_id AS serviceId, subject_id as subjectId, is_alow as isAlow, link_man as linkMan, link_tel as linkTel, send_time as sendTime, alow_money as alowMoney, work_address as workAddress, order_type as orderType, is_simple as isSimple, delegate_desc as delegateDesc FROM fm_order
and service_id = 1
and case_no = #{caseNo}
and deal_stat in ('04','05','06','07','08','09')

SELECT CAST(t.id AS CHAR) AS id, t.order_no AS orderNO, CAST(t.task_id AS CHAR) AS taskId, CAST(t.work_id AS CHAR) AS workId, t.work_type AS workType FROM fm_task_order_work_relation t , fm_task_info ti WHERE t.task_id = ti.id AND t.order_no = #{orderNo} AND ti.source = '1' limit 1

select g.user_id as groupUserId, b.bind_id as ext7, b2.bind_id as ext8, o.id as id, o.service_id as serviceId, o.subject_id as subjectId, o.order_no as orderNo, o.deal_stat as dealStat, o.order_type as orderType, o.case_no as caseNo, o.ext1 as ext1, o.ext2 as ext2, o.buyer_user_name as buyerUserName, o.buyer_user_id as buyerUserId,
o.payer_user_id as payerUserId, o.seller_user_name as sellerUserName, s.mobile as sellerUserType, o.send_id as sendId, o.send_time as sendTime, o.get_time as getTime from fm_order o left join ct_group g on ( case when o.ext2 in
#{area}
then (case when g.city_code = o.ext2 then 1 else 2 end ) ELSE (case when g.prov_code = o.ext1 then 1 else 2 end ) END ) = 1 inner JOIN ct_user u2 on g.user_id = u2.id and u2.user_type = '1' left join ct_bind_info b on b.user_id = o.seller_user_id left join ct_bind_info b2 on b2.user_id = g.user_id left join ct_user s on s.id = o.seller_user_id where o.service_id = 1 and o.import_type = '0' and o.deal_stat = '04' and ( (o.subject_id = '0' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, NOW()) BETWEEN 11 and 12) or (o.subject_id in ('1','2','3') and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, o.send_time, NOW()) BETWEEN 23 and 24) ) and (b.bind_id is not null OR b2.bind_id is not null)

SELECT o.id AS id, o.user_id AS userId, o.msg_type AS msgType, b.bind_id AS msgTo, o.msg_from AS msgFrom, o.msg_content AS msgContent, o.send_flag AS sendFlag, o.send_time AS sendTime, o.send_num AS sendNum, o.create_by AS createBy, o.create_time AS createTime FROM cms_out_box o LEFT JOIN ct_bind_info b ON o.user_id = b.user_id WHERE o.msg_type = '1' AND o.send_flag != '1'
AND o.send_num < 3
AND b.bind_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY b.bind_id, o.msg_content ORDER BY o.send_flag, o.id DESC
